Summary: Parmesan Garlic Air Fryer Carrots are perfectly seasoned and absolutely delicious!Â  This side dish is perfectly crisp on the outside, tender on the inside and so full flavor.
Instructions: Wash, peel, and cut 6 large carrots, into 2-inches slices.
In a medium-sized bowl, add Â¼ cup olive oil, 2 tablespoons grated parmesan cheese, 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning, Â½ teaspoon garlic powder, and salt and pepper to taste.
Toss with the carrots and place in a single layer into the basket of an air fryer.
Cook at 360 degrees Fahrenheit for 10-12 minutes or until tender and crispy. Garnish with fresh chopped parsley and serve.
